about_the_game:
Survive & Build:

Start with a small raft and expand it piece by piece using salvaged materials from the ocean. Gather floating debris, explore mysterious islands, and mine deep caves for rare resources. Construct tools, upgrade your raft, and turn it into a floating fortress.

Explore the Endless Ocean:

The world is procedurally generated, filled with randomly appearing islands, hidden dangers, and abandoned ruins from the old world. Every journey is unique—will you find treasure, secrets, or rival survivors?

Fight to Stay Afloat:
You are not alone. Other survivors roam the seas, each building their own rafts and fighting for resources. Engage in tense naval battles, board enemy rafts, steal supplies, and defend your floating home. But be careful—alliances and betrayals are part of life on the high seas.

Key Features:
Craft & Expand: Build your raft from the ground up with scavenged materials.
Dynamic Exploration: Discover randomly generated islands and underwater ruins.
Survival Mechanics: Manage food, water, and supplies to stay alive.
Naval Combat: Engage in real-time battles against NPC raiders and rival survivors.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Dedicated Memory
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: After a catastrophic event flooded the Earth, the remnants of humanity are left adrift on an endless ocean. With nothing but scraps of the old world floating across the waves, survivors must scavenge, build, and fight to stay alive in this vast water-covered wasteland.
